content:
To operate a food truck in Heavenly Village, you will need to obtain permission from the property management company that oversees the village. The village has its own rules and regulations for vendors, and you will need to comply with these in order to operate your food truck there.

It is recommended that you contact the Heavenly Village property management company directly to inquire about their requirements and the process for obtaining permission to operate a food truck on their property. They will be able to provide you with information on any necessary permits, fees, and insurance requirements, as well as any restrictions or guidelines for food trucks in the area.
